title: FIX: Update remaining 'jjz' references in help text
description:
Fix help text that still references old 'jjz' command names.

SCOPE:
- File: crates/zjj/src/cli/args.rs
- Lines: ~48-220 (help text for init, add, and other commands)
- Issue: Examples use 'jjz' instead of 'zjj'

EXAMPLES TO UPDATE:
- 'jjz init' → 'zjj init'
- 'jjz add' → 'zjj add'
- 'jjz sync' → 'zjj sync'
- 'jjz remove' → 'zjj remove'
- 'jjz focus' → 'zjj focus'
- 'jjz status' → 'zjj status'
- All other command references

VERIFICATION:
- Build: cargo build --release -p zjj
- Check: ./target/release/zjj --help | grep -i jjz
  - Expected: No matches
- Check: ./target/release/zjj --help | grep zjj
  - Expected: Multiple matches showing examples

BLOCKERS: None
DEPENDS_ON: Binary and directory rename (already complete)
